text: Olowo Rerengejen was the traditional ruler of Owo Kingdom, Ondo state, southwestern Nigeria. He was the King that married Queen Oronsen, the goddess that brought about Igogo festival. ==References== Category:Yoruba monarchs Category:Nigerian traditional rulers Category:People from Owo Category:15th- century monarchs in Africa Category:15th-century Nigerian people
title: Olowo Rerengejen
